text: Uherské Hradiště is a town in the Czech Republic. About 26,280 people live there (2008). It is located in the South-East of the historical region Moravia in the Zlín region. It was founded on October 15 1257 by the Czech king Přemysl Otakar II. == Partner towns == * Bridgwater, United Kingdom * Mayen, Germany * Trenčín, Slovakia == Other websites == *Uherské Hradiště webpage Category:Cities in the Czech Republic Category:Zlín Region
title: Uherské Hradiště
